name: Gateway Mellat Bank for CampTix
author: Heydar Ghanei

sections.description:
Iranian Mellat Bank Gateway for the CampTix plugin.

Take payments in IRR through bank mellat using the CampTix plugin. CampTix plugin needs to be installed and activated for the bank mellat payment gateway to work.
sections.installation:
1. Upload to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Tickets -> Setup in your WordPress admin area to set the currency to IRR and activate the Mellat Bank gateway.
